sentences: Poeg on täiesti oma isa sarnane.
Majad uues linnaosas on äravahetamiseni sarnased.
context: The Estonian word 'sarnane' is an adjective meaning similar or alike. It describes things that share characteristics, appearance, qualities, or features in some way. The word can be used to compare people, objects, ideas, or concepts that have common traits or resemble each other in certain respects.
